title: Subpart 242-8 - MONITORING AND REPORTING
content:

State Regulations
§ 242-8.1 - General requirements
§ 242-8.2 - Initial certification and recertification procedures
§ 242-8.3 - Out-of-control periods
§ 242-8.4 - Notifications
§ 242-8.5 - Recordkeeping and reporting
§ 242-8.6 - Petitions
§ 242-8.7 - CO[2] budget units that co-fire eligible biomass
§ 242-8.8 - Repealed

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
